model

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a model for a photo. Has a serializable image, caption, list of tags, and a date (cal). Implements the serializable interface.
    Since:
    2016-03-26
    Author:
    Corentin Rejaud, Julia Sutula
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
